block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from the most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from the most recent listing to contract.

2-bedroom, 1-bath, 950-sq.-ft. triplex co-op in a prewar town house; 16-ft. ceiling in living room, fireplace, h/w floors, terrace, 2 exposures; maintenance $770, 66% tax-deductible, listed at $325,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Stribling Associates Wells & Gay)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 700-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, high ceilings, h/w floors, 3 exposures; maintenance $476, 48% tax-deductible, listed at $335,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

5-bedroom, 5-bath, 3,500-sq.-ft. postwar condo; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, windowed kitchen, mahogany floors, 2 balconies, 4 exposures; common charge $1,762, taxes $12,444, listed at $2.65 million, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker Hunt Kennedy; William B. May)

1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 802-sq.-ft. postwar condo; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, balcony, south exposure, health club; common charge $539, taxes $2,736, listed at $229,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Clayman Realty Group)

1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 850-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, southern exposure, pool, gym and common gardens, listed at $380,000, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Corcoran Group; Citi Habitats)

2-family, 45-year-old brick house; 3 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, dining room in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; eat-in kitchen in each; 20- by 93-ft. lot; taxes $1,600, listed at $195,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Heritage First Realty/Better Homes & Gardens)

2-family, 60-year-old detached house; 3 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in each unit; finished basement, shared driveway, 26- by 80-ft. lot; taxes $1,600, listed at $209,000, 21 weeks on market (Broker: Homes 'R' Beautiful)

4-bedroom, 2-bath, turn-of-the-century Victorian; dining room, renovated kitchen and baths, cathedral ceiling in family room, 50- by 100-ft. lot in historic district; taxes $3,200, listed at $339,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Aguayo & Huebener)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a brownstone; eat-in kitchen, fireplace, deck, Manhattan skylight view; maintenance $495, 50% tax-deductible, listed at $285,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Susan N. Breen)

3-family, 50-year-old semi-attached stucco-sided house; 2 bedrooms, dining room, eat-in kitchen in primary unit; 1 bedroom in others, 1 bath in each, 26- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $2,800, listed at $399,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Kingdom)

5-bedroom, 2-bath, 48-year-old brick-and-fieldstone Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, finished basement, new windows, 1-car garage; taxes $2,034, listed at $325,000, 1 week on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

3-bedroom, 2 full-, 2 half-bath, 63-year-old brick-and-fieldstone Tudor; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 1-car garage, 68- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $2,433, listed at $339,000, 26 weeks on market (Broker: Goller & Costi)

3-bedroom, 3-bath, 45-year-old brick and wood-frame colonial; dining area, eat-in kitchen, rec room, hospitality suite over 2-car garage; taxes $2,360, listed at $398,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Salmon)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 65-year-old Tudor; h/w floors, 2-car garage, full finished basement, dining room, brick walkway; taxes $6,665, listed at $379,000 (multiple offers), 1 week on market (Broker: Weichert)
4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 3-year-old colonial; deck, 1.32-acre lot, finished basement; taxes $7,440, listed at $317,900, 4 months on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)
3-bedroom, 2-bath, 30-year-old split level; pool, 125- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $4,248, listed at $149,900, 7 months on market (Broker: Rollie Davis)
6-bedroom, 3 full-, 2 half-bath, 76-year-old colonial; fireplace, dining room, h/w floors, 2-car garage; taxes $5,420, listed at $159,900, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Weidel)

2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 42-year-old aluminum-sided colonial; h/w floors, new roof, 2 fireplaces, 2-car garage, .14-acre lot; taxes $4,908, listed at $129,900, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: ERA/Premiere Realty; Coldwell Banker/Norwalk)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 14-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, c/a, fireplace, 2-car garage, .14-acre lot; taxes $4,039, listed at $399,000, 16 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; Douglas Elliman Pickering)

4-bedroom, 2 full-, 2 half-bath, 4-year-old contemporary; dining room, family room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, vaulted ceilings, Jacuzzi, enclosed sun porch, 3-car garage, 2.5-acre lot; taxes $6,187, listed at $389,900, 14 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)
4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 34-year-old raised ranch; dining room, c/a, sun room, balcony, deck, 2-car garage, 2.36-acre lot; taxes $5,157, listed at $369,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: William Pitt)
4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 100-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room; taxes $4,800, listed at $309,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Harmonious Homes)
3-bedroom, 2-bath, 54-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement; taxes $4,200, listed at $184,990, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21 Prevete)
3-bedroom, 2-bath, 46-year-old ranch; dining room, finished basement, 1-car garage; taxes $4,200, listed at $259,000, 1 day on market (Broker: Century 21 Birch Tree)
3-bedroom, 2-bath, 50-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den; taxes $5,300, listed $249,000, 20 weeks on market (Brokers: Heineman; Jan Kalman)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1-year-old colonial; entry foyer, dining room, family room, deck, marble bath, Jacuzzi, 2-car garage, .41 acre; taxes $19,000, listed at $749,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

8-bedroom, 5 1/2-bath, 96-year-old Georgian manor house; fish pond, movie theater, parquet floors, pool, .92 acre; taxes $29,728, listed at $1.995 million, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Burbank Whittemore; Merritt Associates)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 5-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, bay window, family room, deck, cathedral ceiling, skylight, Jacuzzi, finished basement, 1-car garage; taxes $5,850, listed at $299,000, 20 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21 Wolff)
